title: RHONY Trailer Premiere! + RHOA Cookie Lady & RHONJ Prom!
itunes:title: RHONY Trailer Premiere! + RHOA Cookie Lady & RHONJ Prom!
itunes:subtitle: Danny dives in to the brand-new #RHONY trailer, then recaps this week's Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured the return of The Cookie Lady. On Real Housewives of New Jersey, the crew celebrates prom with Gia and Frankie, then heads to the Je...
description:
Danny dives in to the brand-new #RHONY trailer, then recaps this week's Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured the return of The Cookie Lady. On Real Housewives of New Jersey, the crew celebrates prom with Gia and Frankie, then heads to the Jersey Shore.


RHOA: 5:55ish

RHONJ: 19:26ish


FOR TICKETS TO EVERYTHING ICONIC LIVE, VISIT https://everythingiconic.com/live-shows
